entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
